rules.natural: Whenever animal behavior is observed in the natural habitat, the animal cooperates during the sequence.
Provided that the research team is present at the site, if animal behavior is observed in the natural habitat, then the animal interaction scene is filmed successfully.
If the weather permits filming, then the lighting conditions are optimal.

Given that the narrator is available for recording, whenever it is not the case that the lack of secured funding for the project implies the camera crew is not ready at the location, the animal interaction scene is filmed successfully.
Either the narrator is available for recording or the voiceover artist is available for recording.

If the script is approved for production, then in case the voiceover artist is available for recording, whenever it is not the case that the failure to secure funding for the project implies the camera crew is not ready at the location, the animal interaction scene is filmed successfully.
Whenever conservation approval is secured, it is not the case that access to the location is restricted.
If the lead researcher is onsite, then in the event that the research team is not present at the site, animal migration has not occurred.
Either the lead researcher is onsite or the assistant researcher is onsite.
Given that the assistant researcher is onsite, if the research team is not present at the site, then it is not the case that animal migration has occurred.
If the director approves the final cut, then the production has been completed as a documentary.
Either the director approves the final cut or the producer approves the final cut.

Provided that the producer approves the final cut, under the condition that it is not the case that the scheduling of daytime animal behavior shooting implies the crew is not filming in the forest leads to a budget overrun for the production, filming faces a schedule delay.
Whenever it is not the case that the weather permitting filming implies the lighting conditions are not optimal, backup equipment is used for the shoot.
In the event that it is not the case that the weather permitting filming implies the lighting conditions are not optimal, it is not the case that backup equipment is used for the shoot.
If it is not the case that animal cooperation during the sequence leads to the animal interaction scene being filmed successfully, then an alternative scene is used in the edit.

Under the condition that it is not the case that animal cooperation during the sequence leads to the animal interaction scene being filmed successfully, it is not the case that an alternative scene is used in the edit.

If it is not the case that either permits for the location are acquired or animal behavior observed in the natural habitat leads to the animal interaction scene being filmed successfully, then access to the location is restricted.

In the event that it is not the case that either permits for the location are acquired or animal behavior observed in the natural habitat leads to the animal interaction scene being filmed successfully, legal clearance is granted.
Should it not be the case that legal clearance being granted leads to conservation approval being secured, a legal dispute arises during filming.
Whenever it is not the case that the lack of secured funding for the project implies the camera crew is not ready at the location, animal behavior is observed in the natural habitat.

In the event that it is not the case that the lack of secured funding for the project implies the camera crew is not ready at the location, it is not the case that the animal interaction scene is filmed successfully.
If the research team is not present at the site, then the weather permits filming.
Given that the research team is not present at the site, animal migration has occurred.
Should the script not be approved for production, the draft requires script revision.
If the script is not approved for production, then it is not the case that the draft requires script revision.
Provided that funding for the project is not secured, the crew is filming in the forest.
In the event that funding for the project is not secured, animal behavior is being shot on a daytime schedule.
Under the condition that funding for the project is not secured, the camera crew is ready at the location.
